snippet.description: WordPress all-in-one for dummies . \- 2nd ed. / Sabin-Wilson, Lisa Top WordPress guide, now fully updated for the latest WordPress release! This updated new edition comprises one of the largest collections of practical intermediate to advanced information on WordPress [...] Hoboken, NJ : Wiley, 2013. - 843 p.

snippet.title: BYOD: Bring your own disaster BYOD : « Bring Your Own Disaster » (Apportez votre propre désastre)
snippet.description: BYOD: Bring your own disaster BYOD : « Bring Your Own Disaster » (Apportez votre propre désastre) / Computer Security Team Have you ever heard of “BYOD”? No, it is not a pop band. Try again. [...] BUL-NA-2013-214.- 2013 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 42/2013 43/2013

snippet.title: Drupal 7 Multilingual Sites
snippet.description: Drupal 7 Multilingual Sites / Pol, Kristen A practical book with plenty of screenshots to guide you through the many features of multilingual Drupal. [...] Birmingham : Packt Publishing Ltd, 2012. - 243 p.

snippet.title: Tailor-made training for digital library software Formation sur mesure aux logiciels de bibliothèque numérique
snippet.description: Tailor-made training for digital library software Formation sur mesure aux logiciels de bibliothèque numérique / Joannah Caborn Wengler Six librarians and IT engineers from Senegal, Mali, Burkina Faso, Ivory Coast and Morocco are currently spending several weeks at CERN as a follow-up to the 5-day CERN-UNESCO Digital Libraries School held in Dakar, Senegal, last year. During their stay, they are honing their mastery of CERN’s Invenio digital library management platform in order to put it to a variety of uses once they return home [...] BUL-NA-2012-162.- 2012 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 20/2012 21/2012 Fulltext: JPG;

snippet.title: Building a new core website for CERN Élaboration d’un nouveau site web pour le CERN
snippet.description: Building a new core website for CERN Élaboration d’un nouveau site web pour le CERN / CERN Bulletin The web was born at CERN, but as early adopters, our own web presence now needs some love. With a new era of discovery ahead of us, the Communication Group is embarking on a project to develop a new core website for CERN that will make it easier and more enjoyable to access information in a timely way [...] BUL-NA-2011-212.- 2011 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 35/2011 36/2011

snippet.title: Computing for Finance
snippet.description: Computing for Finance The finance sector is one of the driving forces for the use of distributed or Grid computing for business purposes. The speakers will review the state-of-the-art of high performance computing in the financial sector, and provide insight into how different types of Grid computing – from local clusters to global networks - are being applied to financial applications [...] 2007 - Streaming video. Special Event External link: Event details In : Computing for Finance
